DOC.brief_title: Prevalence Chondromalacia Patella Among Adolescent Dancers - Correlation Between Symptoms Sonography Findings
DOC.detailed_description: A cross sectional study compare dancer non-dancers athlete carry . Specifically , chondromalacia patella study compare dancer without knee injury non-dancers athlete . Study include detailed function pain questionnaire , physical finding sonographic study knee joint .
DOC.criteria: Group A Dancers knee injury : 1 . Min . 3 hour classic ballet dance per week 2 . At least 4 year dance practice 3 . Reported knee pain last 6 month 1 . Injury knee joint Group B Dancers without knee injury : 1 . Min . 3 hour classic ballet dance per week 2 . At least 4 year dance practice 3 . Reported musculoskeletal injury last 6 month 1 . None Group C Nondancers athletes : 1 . Main physical activity dance 1 . Reported musculoskeletal injury last 6 month
